overview: Time for some fun, thrills & spills with Fireman Sam! There are seaside shenanigans a plenty in Pontypandy as Norman and Penny take sailing lessons, a fire breaks out on Charlie’s fishing boat and a whale becomes stranded on the beach. Back on dry land, there’s even more adventures when Elvis is left in charge of the fire station. Join in the excitement and make a splash with ‘Choppy Waters’!
title: Fireman Sam Choppy Waters
